Solo Vegan Porefect Match Milky Cleanser

Brand: Solovegan

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS(SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, GLYCERIN, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, ARACHIDYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL STEARATE, NIACINAMIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ARACHIDYL GLUCOSIDE, VINYL DIMETHICONE, XANTHAN GUM, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ETHYL

PRYLYL GLYCOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SQUALANE, CITRIC ACID, ALLANTOIN, DISODIUM EDTA, GLUCOSE, MANGIFERA INDICA (MANGO) SEED BUTTER

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
